ToolSetting.title: Tool Setting
ToolSetting.description: Represents the configuration and status of a single tool.

enabled.description: Whether the tool is active and visible to users.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile and app-specific data.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

joined.description: The date and time the user signed up.

role.description: The user's role in the system.

credits.description: The number of credits the user has available.

favoriteTools.description: An array of tool paths that the user has marked as favorite.

Ad.title: Advertisement
Ad.description: Represents an ad configuration for display on the website.

name.description: The internal name for the ad.

status.description: The current status of the ad.

placements.description: An array of placement identifiers where the ad should appear.

content.description: The actual content of the ad.

clicks.description: The number of times the ad has been clicked.

impressions.description: The number of times the ad has been viewed.

ContactMessage.title: Contact Message
ContactMessage.description: Represents a message submitted through the contact form.

name.description: The full name of the person sending the message.

email.description: The email address of the person sending the message.

submittedAt.description: The timestamp when the message was submitted.

AuditLog.title: Audit Log
AuditLog.description: Represents a log of actions performed by users.

userId.description: The ID of the user who performed the action.

userEmail.description: The email of the user who performed the action.

action.description: A description of the action performed.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents an in-app notification for users.

message.description: The main content of the notification.

variant.description: The style variant of the notification.

imageUrl.description: An optional image to display with the notification.

SeoOverride.title: SEO Override
SeoOverride.description: Stores custom SEO metadata for a specific page.

metaTitle.description: The custom meta title for the page.

metaDescription.description: The custom meta description for the page.

BlogPost.title: Blog Post
BlogPost.description: Represents a single blog post or article.

title.description: The main title of the blog post.

category.description: The category the blog post belongs to.

status.description: The current status of the post.

date.description: The publication date of the post.

imageUrl.description: URL of the post's featured image.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI image generation or search.

content.description: The full content of the blog post in Markdown or HTML.

PageContent.title: Page Content
PageContent.description: Stores editable content for a specific website page.

/tools-settings/{toolId}.description: Stores settings for each tool, such as its enabled status. The document ID corresponds to the tool's path, with slashes replaced by underscores.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information, including their plan, status, and join date.

/ads/{adId}.description: Stores ad configurations for the website.

/contact-messages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages submitted through the contact form.

/audit-logs/{logId}.description: Stores audit log entries for administrative actions.

/seo-overrides/{pagePath}.description: Stores custom SEO metadata for specific site pages. The document ID is the URL-encoded page path.

/blog-posts/{postId}.description: Stores all blog posts for the website.

/pages/{pageId}.description: Stores editable content for website pages. The document ID is the URL-encoded page path.
